cont.entity_a: Easy to use with the quick start guide.

Optics.comm: Optics are good for the price.

cont.entity_a: Optics are crystal clear and easy to focus. Amazing for the price.
The mount could be more stable.
Barlow lens does not work well.
cont.entity_b: Objective lens was shattered upon arrival.

cont.entity_a: Picks up Saturn's rings and the four Galilean moons of Jupiter with the lowest magnification. 60x magnification lacks focus.
Easy to assemble with good quality pieces.
Good quality accessories for the price.
Lightweight and mobile, but can be easily knocked over.
CD guide is more helpful than paper instructions.
Great for viewing the moon but not planets. Not suitable for viewing deep space objects.
cont.entity_b: Optics are very good for beginners.
Difficult to focus correctly. Inner cylinder misalignment affects focus.
Customer service is poor. Customer service from Amazon is excellent.

cont.entity_a: Comes with a tripod and eye attachment.
Clear views of the moon with visible crater lines.
cont.entity_b: Views of the moon, Jupiter, and Saturn are good. Images are clear and up close.

cont.entity_a: Slow motion altitude adjustment is a useful feature.
cont.entity_b: The mount needs slow motion controls.
Missing telescope lenses and a screw.
